name: C=razy pong
description:
Written in 4 evenings (out of competition) for the Retro Programmers Inside Commodore logo code jam ( https://itch.io/jam/retro-logo-game-jam )

It's a Pong game with a big C= logo appearing in the middle of the screen and changing the route of the C= ball, making the game more funny and various compared to the original Pong game.

In-game Sid credits: Nodes of Yesod
